summary: Interactive romantic Valentine invitation page for 'cutey' with Yes/No choices; 'No' button dodges clicks and cycles through playful prompts, while 'Yes' triggers fireworks and celebratory message with a couple picture on a light pink, heart/rose-themed background.
architectural_notes: Single-page interactive invitation with click handlers for Yes/No; No action cycles through a predefined message list and repositions the button each time; Yes action triggers an animation + content swap.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Seamless romantic background pattern with small red hearts and subtle rose petals on light pink (valentine-bg-pattern.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Cute couple illustration in a romantic style with transparent background (valentine-couple.dim_900x900.png)

existing_features.title: Create a single-page Valentine invitation UI with a centered layout that shows: (1) a large name heading "cutey"; (2) the question text "Will you be my Valentine üíñ" under the name; (3) two boxed options/buttons labeled "Yes üíó" and "No".

Implement the "No" button interaction: on each click, move the "No" button to a different position within a bounded on-screen area (so it remains visible/clickable) and show a fixed-position prompt box under the name that cycles through the specified messages in order, looping after the last message back to the start of the loop.

Implement the "Yes üíó" button interaction: when clicked, display a fireworks animation effect and replace/overlay the main content with celebratory text: a large "Yay ü•≥" headline, followed by "I know you'd say Yes!üíñ" and "You've made me the Happiest ‚ò∫Ô∏è", and show a couple picture.

Apply a consistent romantic visual theme across the page: light pink background, red hearts/rose decorative elements, and cohesive typography and spacing that feels like a Valentine invitation (avoid blue/purple styling).
Add the required generated images to the app as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in the UI (no backend image serving).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create Valentine invitation UI with large name 'cutey', question text, and two boxed buttons: 'Yes üíó' and 'No'.
Implement 'No' button behavior: move to new positions on each click and show a fixed-position prompt box under the name cycling through specified messages in a loop.
Implement 'Yes' button behavior: trigger fireworks animation and show celebratory texts ('Yay ü•≥', 'I know you'd say Yes!üíñ', 'You've made me the Happiest ‚ò∫Ô∏è') and display a couple image.
Apply romantic theme styling: light pink background with red hearts/rose elements and overall romantic look.

projectName: Romantic Valentine invitation page with dodging No button, looping prompts, and Yes fireworks celebration
